name: Wand of Wizardry (1h)
data: It has superb weapon class for its type (weak in general).
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'channel power'.
It gives nice bonus to the spell 'fire preference'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'gestalt conjuration'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'cold preference'.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'intentionality'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'microclasm'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'power blast'.
